Episodes.Title: Episode 1
Episodes.Plot: The four life-long friends continue their holiday from hell, when a sighting of Dominic heading towards the villa stops them in their tracks as they prepare to drive off and leave Quinn behind.

Episodes.Title: Episode 2
Episodes.Plot: The nightmare continues to unfold. Woody, Quinn, Baxter and Rick cover their tracks by heading to a remote village, only for strange forces to come into play...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes,offensive language and content that may disturb.

Episodes.Title: Episode 3
Episodes.Plot: The boys finds themselves unable to catch a break. They attempt to undo the damage they've unwittingly done and a race against the clock ends up pushing them to breaking point.

Episodes.Title: Episode 4
Episodes.Plot: There are still a few twists in the tale in this second series finale.Woody, Quinn, Baxter and Rick have a chance to win back their freedom, but at what cost?
